ack.p: We thank the physicians and staff at Hangzhou, Huzhou, Jiaxing, Wenzhou, Shaoxing municipal center for disease control and prevention for their support and assistance with this investigation. We also thank Dr. Shuo Su and two reviewers for their valuable and constructive comments. The work is supported by Basic research project from Shenzhen Municipal Science and Technology Program (Grant number: JCYJ20150630165236958), National Natural Science Foundation of China (Grant number: 81473035), Zhejiang Province Major Science and Technology Program (2014C03039), and Medical Research Programme (2016RCA008).
